title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Strengthening Capabilities Using Virtual Classroom Learning Management Systems (LMS)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can manage instructional materials with over 80% accuracy in virtual classroom environments using core LMS features
Participants can collect learner feedback using online survey tools and interpret results with basic statistical analysis functions
Participants can practice designing language curriculum lessons applying LMS in simulation/VR environments at least three times and derive improvement strategies through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
